title: Corumbiara Aka Corumbiara: They Shoot Indians, Don't They? (200
description:
In 1985, anthropologist Marcelo Santos, denouncing the massacre of Indians in Corumbiara Gleba (RO), and Vincent Carelli shooting that remains of the evidence. Very violent, the case goes through fantasy, and fall into oblivion.
Marcelo and his team take years to find survivors. Two decades later, "Corumbiara" reveals this quest and the Indian version ...
